name: Wrong Place - Wrong Time
description:
Made for the ACM Studio Gacha Jam.

After an accident in your research lab, your time machine has broken down and caused a rift in the time-space continuum. Mysterious enemies are pouring through the portal, and it's up to you (and some temporally displaced allies) to stop them from destroying the time machine!

Nareh Agazaryan - Gameplay Programming

Caleb Kim - UI/UX Design

Calvin Nguyen - Writing, Sound Design, Unit Portraits

Anbu Vajuravel - Character Spritework
